# DataCollection.GetTable method

Returns the [`Table`](../Table.md) in this DataCollection having the name passed as parameter.

```csharp
public Table GetTable(string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | The name of the [`Table`](../Table.md) to retrieve. |

## Return Value

The [`Table`](../Table.md) with the name passed as parameter.
